Responsive Navigation Pushdown

This style of responsive navigation will push down the page when the "Menu" button is pushed.

Setup

Include 'responsive-pushdown.css' in src/styles/lib/components/navigation/index.css

Include the following Javascript. It would often be added to src/scripts/index.js


<script>
    (function ($) {
        /**
         * Small screen navigation
         */
        $('.js-ssNavBtn').on('click', function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            $(this).toggleClass('is-active');
            $('.js-mainNav').toggle();
        });

        $('.js-dropdown').on('click', function(e) {
            if ($(window).width() <= 1050) {
                e.preventDefault();
                $(this).toggleClass('is-active').parent().toggleClass('is-active');
            }
        });
    }(jQuery));
</script>
